items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Global market sell-off weighs on sentiment; stock specific action likely
items.description: Indian markets were likely to open lower on Wednesday, dragged down by a sharp sell-off in global markets after weak manufacturing data in the US.

items.title: Stocks to Watch: GIC Re, Cipla, IEX, KIMS, IEX, Finolex Cables
items.description: MK Hamied has resigned as Vice Chairman of Cipla, effective October 29. Kamil Hamied will join the board as a Non-Executive Director starting November 1.

items.title: Trading Strategy: Nifty PSU Bank, Private Bank eye breakout; key levels
items.description: The Nifty PSU Banks Index is currently range-bound, oscillating between the levels of 7,090 and 6,910. This indicates a phase of consolidation, where the index lacks clear direction

items.title: Stocks to Buy: CEAT, Star Health are top picks of Vinay Rajani of HDFC Sec
items.description: CEAT is on the verge of breaking out from inverted head and shoulder pattern on the daily chart. Price rise was accompanied by healthy volumes

items.title: These are top three stocks recommended by Chandan Taparia of MOFSL
items.description: ICICI Prudential has formed an Ascending Triangle with a Breakout near the ATH Price on daily chart indicating buyers are squeezing out the sellers and are ready for a bullish move

items.title: Share market today: US, Asian markets fall, Gala Precision, ECOS IPO eyed
items.description: The US, Asian markets slump on rate cut worries;  Gala Precision IPO close, ECOS (India) IPO listing on radar

items.title: Dividend, share buyback: These 10 stocks go ex-date today; do you own any?
items.description: Shares of Transport Corporation of India will trade ex-date today for the share buyback, while Prince Pipes and 8 others will trade ex-dividend today

items.title: Adani Enterprises kicks off its maiden bond sale aimed at individuals
items.description: The flagship firm of Indian billionaire Gautam Adani's group plans to raise as much as Rs 800 crore ($95.3 million) through the issuance

items.title: F&O Cues: Nifty key level 25,150, hint options; 2 stocks with bullish bias
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 04: FIIs continue to hold long bets in index futures in the 5:2 ratio, while DIIs and retail hold shorts in the 3:2 ratio. Three stocks under F&O ban on Wednesday

items.title: Atlantaa hits 52-week high on securing commencement certificate for project
items.description: The surge in Atlantaa share price came after the company announced that it has received Commencement Certificate for its project, Atlanta Enclave Phase 11, from Thane Municipal Corporation

items.title: ECOS Mobility revs up in weak market, lists at 17% premium on BSE, NSE
items.description: Ahead of their debut on the bourses, the shares of Ecos (India) Mobility & Hospitality were quoted at a strong grey market premium of Rs 126 or 37.37 per cent, indicating a favourable market debut

items.title: GIC Re slips 5% after Govt plans to dilute 6.78% stake to raise Rs 4,700 cr
items.description: The decline in GIC Re's share price follows the central government's announcement of its plan to reduce its stake in the company by 6.78 percent to raise about Rs 4,700 crore.

items.title: Asian Paints, Indigo Paints, Kansai gain up to 5% on falling oil prices
items.description: Brent crude oil fell nearly 5 per cent on Tuesday. Crude oil is a key component in the production of certain raw materials used in the manufacturing of paints

items.title: Why Sensex fell over 700 pts, Nifty slipped below 25,200 intraday today
items.description: On the BSE Sensex, index heavyweights like Infosys, TCS and ICICI Bank among others fell by 1 per cent each. Meanwhile, Coal India, ONGC, LTIMindtree, Mahindra and Mahindra and Wipro led losses on NSE

items.title: Exicom Tele-Systems drops 5% after Rare Enterprise sells 1.5 mn shares
items.description: The fall in the Exicom Telecoms share price came after Late Rakesh Jhunjhunwla-backed entity Rare Enterprises offloaded 15,85,000 shares of Exicom Telecoms at Rs 348.60 per share.

items.title: This stock has zoomed 61% in 2 weeks as Ramesh S Damani, Promoters up stake
items.description: NIIT share price today hit a new high of Rs 190.10 on the NSE after over 6 million shares change hands

items.title: Baazar Style Retail IPO allotment today; check status, GMP, listing date
items.description: Once the allotment is finalised, investors can check their status on the official websites of BSE, NSE, or Link Intime India, the registrar for the issue

items.title: Stock market outlook: Here's why Sensex, Nifty can fall in September
items.description: Short-term share market forecast: Among sectors, the Nifty PSU Bank, Metal and IT indices could fall up to 7 per cent from present levels; Bullish pivot for Nifty stands at 25,030.

items.title: Cochin Shipyard, HAL, GRSE gain after DAC approves 10 capital acquisition
items.description: DAC has accorded Acceptance of Necessity (AoN) for 10 capital acquisition proposals amounting to Rs 1,44,716 crore

items.title: KIMS shares hit lifetime high on ex-date announcement for 1:5 stock split
items.description: KIMS share price zoomed after the hospital chain on Tuesday announced that it has set September 13, 2024, as the record date for its 5-for-1 stock split

items.title: This Dolly Khanna-owned stock has zoomed 263% in 3 month; stock at new high
items.description: Shares of Pondy Oxides and Chemicals were locked in upper circuit of 10%, after hitting a new high of Rs 2,173.90 on the BSE on Wednesday at 11:09 AM, in an otherwise weak market.

items.title: ICICI Securities raises Signature Global target price, sees 35% upside
items.description: Following the boost in its target price, Signature Global share gained 1.77% intraday. The price hike was attributed to its strong project portfolio and its scope for expansion beyond Gurugram.

items.title: Mankind Pharma shares gain after OTC biz transfer to subsidiary; details
items.description: Mankind Pharma share price surged after the company on Tuesday completed a business transfer agreement (BTA) to shift its over-the-counter (OTC) business to its wholly owned subsidiary

items.title: Gala Precision IPO GMP soars on last bidding day; should you apply today?
items.description: The three-day subscription window to bid for the Gala Precision Engineering IPO, which opened on Monday, September 2, 2024, is set to conclude today

items.title: Here's why Rama Steel Tubes shares rallied 14% on September 4; details here
items.description: The rise in Rama Steel Tubes came after the company announced that it has inked a partnership with Onix Renewable.
